rows: If you select this checkbox, the button will close the page and terminate an element with a specific result you can use in conditional flows, similar to thePerform taskelement. You can use any button that closes the page in a conditional flow.
Validates and saves the entered data
If you select this checkbox, the button will check if the user filled out the required fields and save the field data once clicked.
Enter the signal the button will generate once clicked, similar to theThrow signalelement.
If you select this checkbox, the button will be active when the page opens. For example, add buttons that are inactive by default and become active according to the page business rules.
html:
Completes the process step

If you select this checkbox, the button will close the page and terminate an element with a specific result you can use in conditional flows, similar to the Perform task element. You can use any button that closes the page in a conditional flow.

Validates and saves the entered data

If you select this checkbox, the button will check if the user filled out the required fields and save the field data once clicked.

Generates a signal

Enter the signal the button will generate once clicked, similar to the Throw signal element.

Active

If you select this checkbox, the button will be active when the page opens. For example, add buttons that are inactive by default and become active according to the page business rules.
